page.title: 08"CREEPING HOUSES!"
page.content: When I first arrived in Lichfield seven years ago the fields behind King Edward VI School on the outskirts of the city were, well, just fields! Now as the years have gone by, a strange phenomenon has occured. A "plague" of modern houses has "crept" across the fields stretching further and further out from the city "gobbling up" anything that stands in its way. The first indication one gets that the "plague" is about to begin is when large signs appear in the field bearing the name of some "mythical god" (or developer!) who has "Purchased the land for Development." Next, large monstrous creatures appear on the scene devouring the land - and turning it into a sea of mud (with holes in it!). At this stage you have passed the point of no return, and, as if by magic, in a few weeks more "Creeping Houses" will appear!
